    126 * 将页面上的坐标转换成画布上的坐标

    128 * @param {Number} clientY 窗口上的y坐标
    129 * @return {Object} 坐标对象包含x,y
    130 */

    1323 var _self = this,
    133 node = _self.get('node'),
    134 viewbox = _self.get('viewbox'),
    135 offset = node.getBoundingClientRect(),
    136 point = {};
    137
    1383 if(!viewbox){ //如果不存在viewbox
    1391 point.x = clientX - offset.left;
    1401 point.y = clientY - offset.top;
    141 }else{
    1422 var xfactor = viewbox.width / _self.get('width'), //计算 宽度比例
    143 yfactor = viewbox.height / _self.get('height'); //高度比例
    1442 point.x = (clientX - offset.left) * xfactor + viewbox.x;
    1452 point.y = (clientY - offset.top) * yfactor + viewbox.y;
    146 }
    147
    1483 return point;
    149 },
    150 /**
    151 * 将相对地址转换成为画布上的坐标

    154 * @return {Object} 坐标对象
    155 */
    156 getRelativePoint : function(dx,dy){
    1571 var _self = this,
    158 viewbox = _self.get('viewbox'),
    159 point = {};
    1601 if(!viewbox){
    1610 point.x = dx;
    1620 point.y = dy;

    1641 var xfactor = viewbox.width / _self.get('width'), //计算 宽度比例
    165 yfactor = viewbox.height / _self.get('height'); //高度比例
    1661 point.x = dx * xfactor + viewbox.x;
    1671 point.y = dy * xfactor + viewbox.y;
    168 }
    169
    1701 return point;
    171 }

    2210 return rst;

    34 /**
    35 * 是否Group
    36 * @type {Boolean}
    37 */
    38 isGroup : true,
    39 //创建DOM
    40 createDom : function(){
    410 var _self = this,
    42 el = _self.get('el'),
    43 attrs = _self.get('attrs'),
    44 node;
    450 if(!el){
    460 el = _self.createElement();
    470 attrs && el.attr(attrs);
    480 _self.set('el',el);
    49 }
    50
    510 node = el.node;
    520 node.group = _self;
    530 _self.set('node',node);
    54 },
    55 //渲染
    56 renderUI : function(){
    570 this._initTranslate();
    58 },
    59 //初始化平移
    60 _initTranslate: function(){
    610 var _self = this,
    62 x = _self.get('x'),
    63 y = _self.get('y');
    640 if(x || y){
    650 _self._translate((x || 0),(y || 0));
    66 }else{
    670 _self.set('x',x || 0);
    680 _self.set('y',y || 0);
    69 }
    70 },
    71 /**
    72 * 移动
    73 * @param {Number} dx 沿x轴平移的距离
    74 * @param {Number} dy 沿y轴平移的距离
    75 */
    76 translate : function(dx,dy){
    770 var _self = this,
    78 x = _self.get('x') || 0,
    79 y = _self.get('y') || 0;
    800 _self.set('x',x + dx);
    810 _self.set('y',y + dy);
    820 _self._translate(dx,dy);
    83 },
    84
    85 getBBox : function(){
    860 var _self = this,
    87 children = _self.get('children'),
    88 w = 0,
    89 h = 0,
    90 rst = {};
    91
    920 Util.each(children,function(item){
    930 var bbox = item.getBBox(),
    94 w1 = bbox.width + bbox.x,
    95 h1 = bbox.height + bbox.y;
    960 if(w < w1){
    970 w = w1;
    98 }
    990 if(h < h1){
    1000 h = h1;
    101 }
    102 });
    103
    1040 rst.x = _self.get('x');
    1050 rst.y = _self.get('y');
    1060 rst.width = w;
    1070 rst.height = h;
    108
    1090 return rst;
    110
    111 },
    112 _translate : function(dx,dy){
    1130 var _self = this,
    114 el = _self.get('el');
    1150 el.translate(dx,dy);
    116 },
    117 /**
    118 * 是否包含指定的DOM
    119 * @param {HTMLElement} element dom元素
    120 * @return {Boolean} 是否包含
    121 */
    122 containsElement : function(element){
    1230 var _self = this,
    124 node = _self.get('node');
    1250 return node == element || Util.contains(node,element);
    126 },
    127
    128 /**
    129 * 移动的到位置
    130 * @param {Number} x 移动到x
    131 * @param {Number} y 移动到y
    132 */
    133 move : function(x,y){
    1340 var _self = this,
    135 cx = _self.get('x') || 0, //当前的x
    136 cy = _self.get('y') || 0; //当前的y
    1370 if(Util.svg){
    1380 _self._translate(x - cx,y -cy);
    139 }else{
    1400 _self.get('el').move(x,y);
    141 }
    142
    1430 _self.set('x',x);
    1440 _self.set('y',y);
    145 },
    146 /**
    147 * @private
    148 * @ignore
    149 */
    150 createElement : function(){
    1510 var _self = this,
    152 el = _self.get('parent').get('el');
    1530 return el.group();
    154 },
    155 /**
    156 * @protected
    157 * @ignore
    158 */
    159 getGroupClass : function(){
    1600 return Group;
    161 }
    162
    163

    123 /**
    124 * 获取路径

    127 getPath : function(){
    1280 var _self = this,
    129 el = _self.get('el'),
    130 path = el.getPath();
    1310 if(Util.isString(path)){
    1320 path = Util.parsePathString(path);

    140 getPathString : function(){

    145 /**
    146 * 获取使用平移后的path
    147 * @return {Array} 路径的数组
    148 */
    149 getTransformPath : function(){
    1500 var _self = this,
    151 path = _self.getPath(),
    152 matrix = _self.get('el').matrix;
    1530 return Util.transformPath(path,matrix.toTransformString());
    154 },
    155 //获取到移动的位置
    156 _getTranslatePoint : function(){
    1570 var _self = this,
    158 tPath = _self.getTransformPath(),
    159 rst = {x : 0,y : 0};
    1600 Util.each(tPath,function(item){
    1610 if(item[0] == 'M'){
    1620 rst.x = item[1];
    1630 rst.y = item[2];
    164 }
    165 });
    1660 return rst;
    167 },
    168 //获取转换的信息，返回一个数组，处理非数组的场景
    169 __getTransform : function(value){
    1700 if(Util.isString(value)){
    1710 value = value.replace(/([t,s,r])/,';$1 ').split(';');
    1720 var temp = [];
    1730 Util.each(value,function(str){
    1740 if(str){
    1750 var sub = str.split(' ');
    1760 sub = Util.map(sub,function(subStr){
    1770 if(Util.isNumeric(subStr)){
    1780 return parseFloat(subStr);
    179 }
    1800 return subStr;
    181 });
    1820 temp.push(sub);
    183 }
    184 });
    1850 value = temp;
    186 }
    1870 return value;
    188 }
    189});

    410function points2path(points,z){
    4110 if(Util.isArray(points)){
    4120 points = points.join(' ');
    413 }
    4140 return 'M' + points + z;
    415}

    632 //圆
    633 circle : function(x,y,r){
    6340 return [['M',x,y - r],['a',r,r,0,1,1,0,2*r],['a',r,r,0,1,1,0,-2*r],['z']];
    635 },
    636 //正方形
    637 square : function(x,y,r){
    6380 return [['M',x-r,y-r],['L',x + r,y-r],['L',x + r,y + r],['L',x - r,y + r],['z']];
    639 },
    640 //菱形
    641 diamond : function(x,y,r){
    6420 return [['M',x - r,y],['L',x,y - r],['L',x + r, y],['L',x,y + r],['z']];
    643 },
    644 //三角形
    645 triangle : function(x,y,r){
    6460 var diffX = r / 0.866,
    647 diffY = r;
    6480 return [['M',x,y-r],['L',x + diffX,y + diffY],['L',x - diffX, y + diffY],['z']];
    649 },
    650 //倒三角形
    651 'triangle-down' : function(x,y,r){
    6520 var diffX = r / 0.866,
    653 diffY = r;
    6540 return [['M',x,y + r],['L',x + diffX, y - diffY],['L',x - diffX,y - diffY],['z']];
    655 }
    656};
    657
    658
    659
    6601Util.extend(Marker,Shape);
    661
    6621Util.augment(Marker,{
    663 //设置半径
    664 __setRadius : function(v){
    6650 var _self = this,
    666 attrs = _self.get('attrs');
    667
    6680 _self._setSize(attrs.x,attrs.y,v);
    669
    670 },
    671 __getRadius : function(){
    6720 return this.get('attrs').radius;
    673 },
    674 //设置x
    675 __setX : function(x){
    6760 var _self = this,
    677 attrs = _self.get('attrs');
    678
    6790 _self._setSize(x,attrs.y,attrs.radius);
    680
    681 },
    682 __getX : function(){
    6830 return this.get('attrs').x;
    684 },
    685 //设置y
    686 __setY : function(y){
    6870 var _self = this,
    688 attrs = _self.get('attrs');
    689
    6900 _self._setSize(attrs.x,y,attrs.radius);
    691
    692 },
    693 __getY : function(){
    6940 return this.get('attrs').y;
    695 },
    696 __getSymbol : function(){
    6970 return this.get('attrs').symbol;
    698 },
    699 //设置大小，位置
    700 _setSize : function(x,y,radius){
    7010 var _self = this,
    702 attrs = _self.get('attrs'),
    703 el = _self.get('el');
    7040 if(el.type !== 'image'){
    7050 var cfg = {
    706 x : x,
    707 y : y,
    708 radius : radius
    709 };
    7100 Util.mix(attrs,cfg);
    7110 var path = _self._getPath(attrs);
    7120 el.attr('path',path);
    713 }else{
    7140 Util.mix(attrs,{
    715 width : radius * 2,
    716 height : radius * 2,
    717 x : x - (radius - attrs.radius),
    718 y : y - (radius - attrs.radius),
    719 radius : radius
    720 });
    7210 el.attr(attrs);
    722 }
    723 },
    724 animate : function(params,ms,easing,callback){
    7250 var _self = this,
    726 attrs = _self.get('attrs'),
    727 path;
    728
    7290 if(_self.get('el').type == 'image'){
    7300 var radius = params.radius || _self.attr('radius');
    7310 params.x = params.x - radius;
    7320 params.y = params.y - radius;
    7330 Util.mix(attrs,{
    734 x : params.x,
    735 y : params.y
    736 });
    7370 _self.get('el').animate(params,ms,easing,callback);
    738 }else{
    7390 Util.mix(attrs,{
    740 x : params.x,
    741 y : params.y
    742 });
    7430 path = _self._getPath(attrs);
    7440 _self.get('el').animate({path : path},ms,easing,callback);
    745 }
    746 },
    747
    748 /**
    749 * @protected
    750 * 格式化初始化配置项
    751 */
    752 parseElCfg : function(attrs){
    7530 var _self = this,
    754 symbol = attrs.symbol,
    755 radius = attrs.radius || 5;
    7560 if(symbol && !Util.isFunction(symbol) && symbol.indexOf('url') != -1){ //图片
    7570 attrs.type = 'image';
    7580 attrs.src = symbol.replace(/url\((.*)\)/,'$1');
    7590 attrs.width = attrs.radius * 2;
    7600 attrs.height = attrs.radius * 2;
    7610 if (Util.vml) {
    7620 attrs.x -= radius-1,
    763 attrs.y -= radius-1;
    764 } else {
    7650 attrs.x -= radius,
    766 attrs.y -= radius;
    767 }
    768 }else{
    7690 attrs.type = 'path';
    7700 attrs.path = _self._getPath(attrs);
    771 }
    7720 return attrs;
    773 },
    774 //获取path
    775 _getPath : function(attrs){
    7760 if(!attrs.symbol && attrs.path){
    7770 return Util.substitute(attrs.path,attrs);
    778 }
    7790 var method;
    780
    7810 if(Util.isFunction(attrs.symbol)){
    7820 method = attrs.symbol;
    783 }else{
    7840 method = Marker.Symbols[attrs.symbol];
    785 }
    786
    7870 if(method){
    7880 return method(attrs.x,attrs.y,attrs.radius)
    789 }else{
    7900 throw 'not support this type ' + attrs.symbol;
    791 }
    792 }
    793
    794});
    795
    7961Shape.Marker = Marker;
    797
    798

    800/**
    801 * @class Chart.Canvas.Shape.Image
    802 * 图片
    803 * @extends Chart.Canvas.Shape
    804 */
    8051var Image = function(cfg){
    8060 Image.superclass.constructor.call(this,cfg);
    807};
    808
    8091Image.ATTRS = {
    810 /**
    811 * 路径
    812 * @type {String}
    813 */
    814 src : {},
    815 /**
    816 * x轴位置
    817 * @type {Number}
    818 */
    819 x : {},
    820 /**
    821 * y轴位置
    822 * @type {Number}
    823 */
    824 y : {},
    825 /**
    826 * 宽度
    827 * @type {Number}
    828 */
    829 width : {},
    830 /**
    831 * 高度
    832 * @type {Number}
    833 */
    834 height : {}
    835}
    836
    8371Util.extend(Image,Shape);
    838
    8391Shape.Image = Image;
